column5: Well that's annoying.  I just did up a HUGE report and got an error message saying "Sorry, you've posted to many pix"  Well, thanks for the sweet info.  How 'bout tell me how many is okay....  Why even limit it?!  It's not even posted here - it's linked out.  And memory is cheap nowadays, N E WAY!  ...  So, anyone know how many pix I CAN post??????????????????????????????????????????????
Ha! Solution!  I'm splitting it up!~  ... I would still like to know what the pic limit is.
Use the post preview button.. and it will show you right away where the limit is. ALWAYS highlight - right click - and copy your post before hitting post or preview!!
Thanks, man.  I'll try that next time!  And yes - I was cuttin' and pastin' the whole report the whole time.  It took way too long to go and lose it!
